items.value:
Nerf Gun
<s>Shoot</s> squirt water at people with it! Or at least one specific circle...

i bet you
won't get
the
reference.
OH! I guess I'll play with you later...
Wow, you're awesome! Let's play another time!
It's A Bully's magnum opus! With Baldi's help, their newest experiment was a success, it makes bullying 10 times easier!

A robotic puppet made of spare parts that came to life after being struck by a lightening bolt!
Don't let it grab ya, though...!

Oh noes! You've been grabbed!
Mash {0}!

Flamin' Hot Cheetos
Hot, spicy flavor packed into crunchy, cheesy snacks.
Their spices will indeed put you into a short rush!

Can of Mangles
Hmm, that brand name sounds pretty familiar!
Eat a few of these to gain a burst of energy,
whether you're in a rush, or saving it for later!

Ultimate Apple
Baldi may surely take longer to eat it,
but that apple is definitely tough stuff!
Make sure you know where to hide once he's done!

Cherry BSODA
A special limited-edition flavored BSODA!
Its unique cherry fizz will propel you as if you were a golf ball!

Cherry BSODA
A special limited-edition flavored BSODA!
Its unique cherry fizz is also extra bouncy, so take caution when it backfires!

A sentient coin resembling a certain someone.
Will reward those who chase down and beat it up with a few special goodies!

"Hey there! I'm Mr. Daycare!"
Mr. Daycare is the man who runs the daycare! He's very good at keeping things in order!
You'll be sitting in the timeout corner for
Do not run inside the hallway!
Do not consume beverages inside the hallway!
Do not consume eat food inside the hallway!
Do not throw things at faculty members inside the hallway!
Do not leave the timeout corner without my permission inside the hallway!
Do not make loud sounds in the hallway!

The inventor of BSODA himself! Watch out, or he'll spray you with it!
He doesn't talk yet speaks a thousand words with his actions...
Eveyone's Bsodaa's greatest pal! She makes sure he always has soda on him! DON'T steal from her!
